name: R2_v2_0298_for_R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R2.v2 CP Range Type for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v2-0298|2.8.2 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R2 to R4B.

concept.display: Flat-rate. Apply the entire price to this interval, do not pro-rate the price if the full interval has not occurred/been consumed
Pro-rate. Apply this price to this interval, pro-rated by whatever portion of the interval has occurred/been consumed

contains.display: Flat-rate. Apply the entire price to this interval, do not pro-rate the price if the full interval has not occurred/been consumed
Pro-rate. Apply this price to this interval, pro-rated by whatever portion of the interval has occurred/been consumed
